nodes.text: The New Republic Era, also known as the era of the New Republic or the Age of the Resistance or the Era of the Resistance, was the period of time that immediately followed the Age of the Empire. It was marked by the rise and rule of the democratic New Republic, which was gradually established after the defeat of the fascist Galactic Empire at Endor. Although that period was mostly an era of peace, the government's lack of vigilance ultimately led to political fragmentation, which in turn permitted the rise of the First Order.
